reviews.review:
Cs:Source Das Game hat absoluten Funfaktor auch auf langen Zeitraum durch die große abwechslung die die verschiedenen Server bieten. Sehr zu empfehlen für die Lanparty da daas Spiel auf so ziemlich jedem Rechner läuft und sparsam für den Geldbeutel ist und sich einfach zusammenspielen lässt, da das Spiel für Lanpartys speziell ausgelegt ist.
Wer lieber etwas bessere Grafik möchte ist der neuste Teil Cs: GO also Counter-Strike: Global Offensive zu empfehlen
you're alive one moment and shot down the next second... AWESOME:D
Играл давным давно в 1.6, а сейчас решил вспомнить молодость! Очень нравится!
Hra aj na túto dobu je veľmi dobre hrateľná, i keď niesom zástancom enigne SOURCE

This is a good game by Valve, I'd say a bit better than CS:GO (Don't flame at me its OPINIONS Darn it) 8/10, its fun, and the mods help it be better and more fun.
One of the oldest shooters arround! Much shooting

Counter-Strike: Source
The epitome of FPS.  So simple, yet so dynamic.   Thousands of fan made maps, game modes, and content.

This game is so awesome HUUNNGGGGG everytime I think about this game I have to poop! HUUNNNNUGHHHH! *ploop* AAGGGGNNNNNNN! *bloop* Its just such an awesome game RRGGGGGNNNNN *SPLASH* I can only play this game while on the toilet otherwise I crap my pants, HGGGNNNN! *splat* that one looks like a Pretzel, GRRR it just keeps on coming out, UGH I need to stop thinking about this game before I drown in my own poop! But I can't help it because this game is the best game ever made! RRRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!! *nuclear explosion of poop*
My all-time favorite FPS game. Great game to relax and enjoy having a gaming session.

det er okay men kunde godt have flere detaljer

Counter-Strike: Source is the definitive military FPS of the last decade. Despite being almost 10 years old, it still holds its own against any modern shooter, both in graphical fidelity and immersive gameplay. With tons of player made maps and complete mods like GunGame, CS:S has stayed fresh throughout the years.

It's definitely worth your time! Give it a go!

Come check out the TX Arlington CS:S Adapative Bots server, one of the longest running, consistent CS:S servers in existence, with some of the most mature and friendly players around!

198.71.51.180:27017

A brilliant game, nothing can be said about that. At the time of release, definitely recommended. If you've played the other Counter Strikes and know what's up recommended. But for people new to the CS franchise, such as myself, the level of skill exhibited by these players is too high for newcomers and you may find yourself swamped. The gameplay is very balanced in itself, but coupled with the skill of the others this game is difficult to master.

That said, once mastered definitely play it or play it to master it. Or just go buy CS:GO.

edit: changed to positive because the game itself is very good

Macht immernoch genauso viel Spaß, wie beim Release.
Da kann sich Go nur ne Scheibe von abschneiden...

Игра обладает золотую середину в серии игр CS я считаю ей лучшей почему?в cs 1.6 игра да для батей кс но в ксс есть графон и изменины карты в лучшую сторону и есть хоть какойто графон а почему я не выбрал CS:GO там много багов и своих фич которых раньше не было а главное донат НОЖ и вся суть CS:GO лучше золотая середина чем остальные советую
je pence que ce jeu est un bon jeu comme touts les gamers les aiment

Ein echt gutes Klassiker Spiel, das vor allem zusammen mit Freunden der reinste Hammer ist. Die verschiedenen Spiel Mods sorgen auch für viel Spielspaß und auch einige witzige Moment, letzteres vor allem in "Hide and Seek" Runden, wo Tische, Stühle und Regal über die Map rennen und probieren sich zu verstecken.

This game is an abomination, it deserves to be buried in the desert along with the ET game because it is the most atrocious game ever concieved. Try and leave the spawn point and you'll be shot in the head without fail. You know the game is a disaster when a single shot from a desert eagle does more damage then a full magazine of an AK-47. Before you ask why the hell i have 120 hours on this game, it's because i was young and naive and thought this game was slightly above decent at the time. I spent hours on it thinking i would someday get better enough to acheive a slightly postivive K/D, i was dead wrong. If you want to be good at this game, you need to devote your entire life to this piece of shit. I pity the idiot, lowlife, bafoons who spend a thousand hours on this game. I heard that you need to practice a lot to get real good at this game, no fucking thank you, I have a life. The people who priase this game as the best shooter in the world are probably the same neckbeards who waste thousands of dollars to build super computers and refuse to go outside when their moms tell them to leave their rooms. If i had one regret, it would be that I wasted 20 dollars on this game many years ago. Stick to Call of Duty or Battlefield if you want to actually enjoy the game you're playing.

What can be said about this game that has yet to be spoken? It is truly the hypest of all PC games. Your enjoyment of shooters or not is irrelevant! Kneel before the master PC game of the superior master console race! But seriously its an amazing game, its not simply TDM or hostage rescue. The countless user generated content keeps the game timeless, even with the release of global offensive I still find my self coming back to this game time and time again. Those who have not played this game at all, should not count them self's as a 'True' PC gamer. I know that's quite a bold statement to make but I'm making it. Im not saying you have to be a source fan girl like me, but you should give it a shot. The graphics are as extreme or as simple as you want it, On my X51 (with a few modifications) I can get about 300FPS in game on maxed settings. While the last Update I recall did put an end to extreme bunny hopping, changes are few and far between for this game, and why shouldn't they be? You wouldn't go putting neon lights on the Mona Lisa would you? The community again is like the graphics... They can be as extreme and vulgar as you want, or a sweet and innocent. Anyway that's enough of me fan girl'ing over my wifu game. I hope this encourages a certain sexy voice actor/ musician to give this game a try, heck ill even buy it for you. If you guys haven't bought it, buy it!
This is an awesome game, with so much to do you'll never get bored. From Zombies to obstacle courses that kill you to epic surf maps the fun never ends with this game. All shall play I rate it 8/10
From day one I've played source, I would recommend this to anyone!
Ol' Gregg likes this game, he thinks its nice. almost as nice as baileys...mmmmm baileys, creamy
Игра радует своей физикой и графикой , которая была охренительна в тех годах. Покупать для тех , кто хочет пострелять в игре с хорошей физикой и для тех , кто вообще любит играть в шутеры.
i give half moon 2 source a elaphant out of five

Una copia del 1.6 pero masterizado (o como se diga) al source... Nada nuevo pero bueno... el 1.6 fue uno  de los que marco mi vida... y la de muchos... por eso lo recomiendo y como nota final le doy un 5/10 porque no trae nada nuevo... solo nuevos graficos.
really fun game, but keep in mind. this game is a stagetic game that requires alot of skill, cant go guns blazen.
